snippet: A new generation in the mainly Muslim suburbs that ring Paris is finding business success by relying on personal initiative rather than government programs.
abstract: New generation in mainly Muslim suburbs of Paris is finding business success by relying on personal initiative rather than government programs; France has long promised improvements in disadvantaged fringes of city, but critics say little has changed, prompting many to do it on their own.
lead_paragraph: A new generation in the mainly Muslim suburbs that ring Paris is finding business success by relying on personal initiative rather than government programs.

headline.seo: In Paris’s Banlieues, New Recipe for Success Is Local
headline.main: In Poor Margins of Paris, New Recipe for Success Is Local
headline.print_headline: In Poor Margins of Paris, New Recipe for Success Is Local
